long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to filter by shorts or videos.  
You can see only the videos or only the short.  
  
Tired of not being able to find the latest video on your favorite youtube because of all those shorts?  
I have the solution! This extension allows you to hide all the shorts and only see the videos in the subscriptions section.  
  
If you love shorts and you want to hide the videos, this extension can do it too!  
  
Don't wait any longer to download this wonderful extension and don't hesitate to send me feedback at [https://forms.gle/3dA3CGuU8kZGQwR37](https://forms.gle/3dA3CGuU8kZGQwR37)
